segments.text: Dad , do you know where Mom is ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think she is in her room putting a little something together for you to take to school with you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: She'd better not start crying like she usually does .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know , but she is going to miss you something awful . Have I told you how proud I am of you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Dad , now don't you go getting mush on me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I mean it . You have really shown us that you are prepared to take on the adult world .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That means a lot to me Dad . Thanks .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We have great confidence in you .
segments.speaker: S2
